attributes.action: Our actors are suffering due to lockdown we cannot lose our theatres
attributes.additional_details:
Everybody is suffering due to COVID-19 but it seems the actors people of the preforming Arts have been left behind ! The people mentioned should be rewarded for the work they have put in to keep people like me with mental health issues sane for the past few months ! 
Prime minister please help our theatres to open in the threat of them being lost forever. Our children would be robbed of a major Part of British culture ! Up and coming actors would have no place to learn PLEASE HELP
attributes.background: Help the preforming arts ! Theatre is part of our culture our actors have been the backbone of social media keeping us sane in these dark days Steve Everts , Reece Dinsdale ,Matt lucas and many many more have entertained us daily they are at risk of losing their platform the theatres HELP THEM
